name: Cat Summoner Lite
description:
STX Games presents a brand new style action game 'Cat Summoner'!

Cat summoner is a casual action game USING TWO FINGERS.
No Tap, No Touch. just Pinching.
Pinch the ground and you can summon a minion cat hiding.
EASY GAME!
Minion cats are so cute and lovely and kawaii!!

To clear the level, you need to summon minions about 3 and make them return to house.
Some houses are too small for big cats.

Lite version feature.
More cats make the village -> town -> city. its same as full version.
playable 6 stage + special bonus stage(score attack, after cleared).

Pinch them all! Enjoy!!
